p: Different compounds found in EO such as aldehydes, phenylpropanoid, and terpenes make EO effective against a wide range of pathogens [ 42, 43], as the composition and the nature of each functional group gives each EO its reactivity [ 23, 44]. Table 1 and Table 2 summarize the antimicrobial activity of a few selected and popular compounds in EO against different microorganisms.
